synopsis.text: Momozono Love, a selfless 14-year-old attending Yotsuba Junior High School, finds herself captivated by a performance from the renowned dance group, Trinity. Inspired, she decides to pursue her newfound dream of becoming a dancer. However, her aspirations are abruptly interrupted when minions from the Labyrinth Kingdom appear, intent on harvesting the audience's unhappiness. Love is granted the power to transform into Cure Peach, and she courageously battles these sinister forces. In her fight, she is joined by her close friends Miki and Inori, who become Cure Berry and Cure Pine, respectively. Together, they juggle their school life, dance rehearsals, and their mission to protect their world from the evil Moebius, a dark lord from a parallel universe, Labyrinth, who is determined to conquer all worlds. The trio, guided by fairies Tart and Chiffon from the Kingdom of Sweets, must harness their powers as legendary Pretty Cure warriors to thwart Moebius' nefarious plans.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
